subject: JavaDocs
msgSnippet: Having decided to put the unit tests in classes named TestFoo (where Foo is the class being unit tested) how do I convince JavaDoc (or rather the Ant javadoc
messageBody:
Having decided to put the unit tests in classes named TestFoo (where Foo is
the class being unit tested) how do I convince JavaDoc (or rather the Ant
javadoc task) to not generate docs for the test classes?
